entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
